channel.title: [Czar] Bit of help required ;)

item.title: [Czar] Bit of help required ;)
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Okay, I can do a fair bit with java, but this is getting me confused. Attempting to put in multiple thieving npc’s into Figments source (his good version ;)).

I’ll make notes of what I’ve tried and how it started.

How it started and worked.

if(NPCID == 1) { pickPocket(1,995,12,100,"Man",2); } server.fishing.second(NPCID, playerId); server.secondClickNpc.SecondClickNpc(NPCID, playerId); break;

What I’ve tried and didn’t work.

if(NPCID == 1) { pickPocket(1,995,12,100,"Man",2); } server.fishing.second(NPCID, playerId); server.secondClickNpc.SecondClickNpc(NPCID, playerId); } if(NPCID == 2) { pickPocket(1,995,12,100,"Man",2); } server.fishing.second(NPCID, playerId); server.secondClickNpc.SecondClickNpc(NPCID, playerId); break;

What did work with no compiling errors, but didn’t respond when thieving the npc was attempted.

				if(NPCID == 1) {
				pickPocket(1,995,12,100,"Man",2);
				}
				server.fishing.second(NPCID, playerId);
				server.secondClickNpc.SecondClickNpc(NPCID, playerId);

				if(NPCID == 2) {
				pickPocket(1,995,12,100,"Man",2);
				}
				server.fishing.second(NPCID, playerId);
				server.secondClickNpc.SecondClickNpc(NPCID, playerId);

Read full topic
